actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy

official_title: To amend the White House Conference on Small Business Authorization Act to require the final report of the National Conference to be published in the Federal Register and distributed through the regional offices of the Small Business Administration.

summary.text: Amends the White House Conference on Small Business Authorization Act to require the final report of the National White House Conference on Small Business to be published in the Federal Register and distributed through the regional offices of the Small Business Administration.

titles.title: To amend the White House Conference on Small Business Authorization Act to require the final report of the National Conference to be published in the Federal Register and distributed through the regional offices of the Small Business Administration.
